bill.title: GUARD VA Benefits Act Governing Unaccredited Representatives Defrauding VA Benefits Act
bill.description: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reinstate criminal penalties for persons charging veterans unauthorized fees relating to claims for benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.
